desc: This is a development achievement for devs ONLY!
You get this achievement when you first sign up to Gameshub!
Place your first pixel in g/Place.
Kill someone in the Gun Game lobby for the first time.
Win a round of BlackJack in GamesHub

header: You win some, and you lose some
desc: Lose over 100 chips (20G) in a single blackjack bet!
Push with the house with a bet of 100 chips or higher
Bet all your chips, totaling 50 or over, in a single round of BlackJack
Add a custom profile picture to your account!
